English_ControlsGoalkeeper: {"title":"Goalkeeper - Controls","items":[{"position":1,"text":"Shift (once) = Save incoming shot","actions":[]},{"position":2,"text":"Both clicks (simultaneously) = Clear ball","actions":[]},{"position":3,"text":"!gk (inside goal box) = Become goalkeeper","actions":[]}],"type":"menu","command":"","exit_back":"English_Controls","flags":""}
Spanish_Community: {"title":"Comunidad","items":[{"position":1,"text":"Grupo Steam Mundial: http://steamcommunity.com/groups/F-I-F-A","actions":[]},{"position":2,"text":"DEV Team (Ulreth & Arbol)","actions":[]},{"position":3,"text":"No dudar en contactar admins para organizar partidos oficiales","actions":[]}],"type":"menu","command":"","exit_back":"MainMenu_Spanish","flags":""}
English_ControlsSuggestions: {"title":"Gameplay Suggestions","items":[{"position":1,"text":"Keep the ball in front of you to shoot accurately","actions":[]},{"position":2,"text":"Knife enemy player near feet to break their dribbling control, also stuck them with your body","actions":[]},{"position":3,"text":"Look up to the sky in order to lift ball","actions":[]},{"position":4,"text":"Use left click to dribble forward and combine it with R (hold)","actions":[]},{"position":5,"text":"Goalkeepers need to knife incoming shot at exact time to save ball","actions":[]},{"position":6,"text":"Save your turbo for moments where opponents are resting (cooldown)","actions":[]}],"type":"menu","command":"","exit_back":"English_Controls","flags":""}
Spanish_ControlsSuggestions: {"title":"Sugerencias generales","items":[{"position":1,"text":"Tener la pelota siempre en frente del jugador para mayor precisión","actions":[]},{"position":2,"text":"Usar cuchillo cerca de los pies o pelota del rival para cortar con su dominio","actions":[]},{"position":3,"text":"Mirar para arriba para levantar pelota","actions":[]},{"position":4,"text":"Aprovechar click izquierdo para moverse y combinarlo con R (mantenido)","actions":[]},{"position":5,"text":"Porteros necesitan apretar los dos clicks en el momento justo para desviar un tiro","actions":[]},{"position":6,"text":"Guarda el turbo para cuando tus rivales descansan (cooldown)","actions":[]}],"type":"menu","command":"","exit_back":"Spanish_Controls","flags":""}
Portugues_Community: {"title":"Comunidade","items":[{"position":1,"text":"Grupo Mundial da Steam: http://steamcommunity.com/groups/F-I-F-A","actions":[]},{"position":2,"text":"DEV Team (Ulreth & Arbol)","actions":[]},{"position":3,"text":"Não hesite em entrar em contato com os administradores para organizar partidas oficiais","actions":[]}],"type":"menu","command":"","exit_back":"MainMenu_Portuguese","flags":""}
Portugues_ControlsSuggestions: {"title":"Sugestões","items":[{"position":1,"text":"Mantenha a bola sempre na frente do jogador para maior precisão","actions":[]},{"position":2,"text":"Use uma faca perto dos pés ou uma bola rival para remover o domínio","actions":[]},{"position":3,"text":"Olhe para cima para levantar a bola","actions":[]},{"position":4,"text":"Combine o botão esquerdo com R para driblar para a frente","actions":[]},{"position":5,"text":"Golero precisa pressionar os dois botões do mouse no momento certo para desviar a bola","actions":[]},{"position":6,"text":"Economize turbo para quando os rivais descansarem (cooldown)","actions":[]}],"type":"menu","command":"","exit_back":"Portugues_Controls","flags":""}
Portugues_ControlsGoalkeeper: {"title":"Goleiro - Controles","items":[{"position":1,"text":"Shift (uma vez) = Pegar bola","actions":[]},{"position":2,"text":"Dois Botaos (mesmo tempo) = Desviar o tiro","actions":[]},{"position":3,"text":"!gk (dentro da area) = Ser goleiro","actions":[]}],"type":"menu","command":"","exit_back":"Portugues_Controls","flags":""}
English_Community: {"title":"Community","items":[{"position":1,"text":"Worldwide Steam Group: http://steamcommunity.com/groups/F-I-F-A","actions":[]},{"position":2,"text":"DEV Team (Ulreth & Arbol)","actions":[]},{"position":3,"text":"Feel free to contact admins in order to play official matches","actions":[]}],"type":"menu","command":"","exit_back":"MainMenu_English","flags":""}
Spanish_ControlsGoalkeeper: {"title":"Portero - Controles","items":[{"position":1,"text":"Shift (una vez) = Atrapar pelota","actions":[]},{"position":2,"text":"Click Izq+Der (mismo tiempo) = Despejar pelota","actions":[]},{"position":3,"text":"!gk (dentro de area) = Convertirse en portero","actions":[]}],"type":"menu","command":"","exit_back":"Spanish_Controls","flags":""}
Portugues_Rules: {"title":"Regras","items":[{"position":1,"text":"Nao marcar gols em sua propria meta","actions":[]},{"position":2,"text":"Nao usar cheats o fazer exploits","actions":[]},{"position":3,"text":"Nao envie spam da outras comunidades","actions":[]},{"position":4,"text":"Nao seja tóxico","actions":[]},{"position":5,"text":"Respeite os outros jogadores e obedeça aos administradores","actions":[]},{"position":6,"text":"As punições podem variar entre slay, mute, kick o ban","actions":[]}],"type":"menu","command":"","exit_back":"MainMenu_Portuguese","flags":""}
Spanish_Rules: {"title":"Reglas","items":[{"position":1,"text":"Prohibido meterse goles en contra","actions":[]},{"position":2,"text":"No usar cheats ni exploits","actions":[]},{"position":3,"text":"Evitar spam de otras comunidades","actions":[]},{"position":4,"text":"Mantener toxicidad al minímo","actions":[]},{"position":5,"text":"Respetar a los otros jugadores y obedecer a los admins","actions":[]},{"position":6,"text":"Castigos pueden variar entre mute, kick, slay, ban, etc.","actions":[]}],"type":"menu","command":"","exit_back":"MainMenu_Spanish","flags":""}
Spanish_ControlsPlayer: {"title":"Jugador - Controles","items":[{"position":1,"text":"Click Izq+Der (mismo tiempo) = Patear fuerte","actions":[]},{"position":2,"text":"Click Der = Pase fuerte","actions":[]},{"position":3,"text":"Click Izq = Dribble o pase corto","actions":[]},{"position":4,"text":"Mouse = Dirección del tiro","actions":[]},{"position":5,"text":"W (2 veces) = Turbo o sprint","actions":[]},{"position":6,"text":"R (mantener) = Atraer pelota","actions":[]},{"position":7,"text":"Shift = Detener pelota","actions":[]},{"position":8,"text":"Shift + A (una vez) = Proximo tiro curva hacia izquierda","actions":[]},{"position":9,"text":"Shift + D (una vez) = Proximo tiro curva hacia derecha","actions":[]},{"position":10,"text":"Shift + S (una vez) = Cancelar comba","actions":[]}],"type":"menu","command":"","exit_back":"Spanish_Controls","flags":""}
English_ControlsPlayer: {"title":"Player - Controls","items":[{"position":1,"text":"Both clicks (simultaneously) = Strong kick","actions":[]},{"position":2,"text":"Right click (once) = Medium kick","actions":[]},{"position":3,"text":"Left click = Soft push / Dribble","actions":[]},{"position":4,"text":"Crosshair = Shot direction","actions":[]},{"position":5,"text":"W (tap 2 times) = Sprint / Turbo","actions":[]},{"position":6,"text":"R (hold) = Attract ball","actions":[]},{"position":7,"text":"Shift (once) = Stop ball","actions":[]},{"position":8,"text":"Shift + A (once) = Next shot will curve to left","actions":[]},{"position":9,"text":"Shift + D (once) = Next shot will curve to right","actions":[]},{"position":10,"text":"Shift + S (once) = Cancel curve","actions":[]}],"type":"menu","command":"","exit_back":"English_Controls","flags":""}
English_Rules: {"title":"Rules","items":[{"position":1,"text":"Do NOT score own goals","actions":[]},{"position":2,"text":"Do NOT use cheats or exploits","actions":[]},{"position":3,"text":"Do NOT spam communities","actions":[]},{"position":4,"text":"Avoid toxic behaviour","actions":[]},{"position":5,"text":"Respect other players & obey admins","actions":[]},{"position":6,"text":"Punishment can vary between mute, kick or ban","actions":[]}],"type":"menu","command":"","exit_back":"MainMenu_English","flags":""}
Portugues_Commands: {"title":"Comandos","items":[{"position":1,"text":"Tab (mantener) --> Mute jogador","actions":[]},{"position":2,"text":"!tp = Alterar a vista da camera","actions":[]},{"position":3,"text":"!gk = Ativar goleiro dentro da area","actions":[]},{"position":4,"text":"!skins = Escolher o equipamento","actions":[]},{"position":5,"text":"!stuck = Liberar jogador","actions":[]},{"position":6,"text":"nominate | rtv","actions":[]},{"position":7,"text":"!rankme","actions":[]},{"position":8,"text":"!rank","actions":[]},{"position":9,"text":"!statsme","actions":[]},{"position":10,"text":"!top","actions":[]}],"type":"menu","command":"","exit_back":"MainMenu_Portuguese","flags":""}
Portugues_ControlsPlayer: {"title":"Jogador - Controles","items":[{"position":1,"text":"Dois Botaos (mesmo tempo) =  Chute muy forte","actions":[]},{"position":2,"text":"Botao direito = Chute normal","actions":[]},{"position":3,"text":"Botao esquerdo = Passar o dribble","actions":[]},{"position":4,"text":"Direcao do mouse = Direcao do chute","actions":[]},{"position":5,"text":"W (dois veces) = Turbo o sprint","actions":[]},{"position":6,"text":"R (mantener) = Atrair bola","actions":[]},{"position":7,"text":"Shift (apretar) = Pare a bola","actions":[]},{"position":8,"text":"Shift + A (uma vez) = Chute virado hacia esquerda","actions":[]},{"position":9,"text":"Shift + D (uma vez) = Chute virado hacia direita","actions":[]},{"position":10,"text":"Shift + S (uma vez) = Cancelar curva","actions":[]}],"type":"menu","command":"","exit_back":"Portugues_Controls","flags":""}
